value.name: Accentuate The Negative
value.description: The plot is simple: A wastrel psychopath, Charles Anthony Bruno, talks a promising young architect, Guy Haines, into killing Bruno’s father in return for Bruno’s killing Guy’s wife.

value.name: High school football coach arrested
value.description: 24-year-old Anthony Bruno initially reported that money earned from a baseball fundraiser was stolen when the coaches' office at the high school was broken into Tuesday night, according to police.
